name: Swarm Queen
description: Swarm Queen is a challenging single-player strategy game about hideous insectoid aliens trying to murder each other.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo or equivalent Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: graphics card not required, but recommended DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 25 MB available space Additional Notes: It could basically run on a potato, if you don't care about the frame rate.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: any graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 25 MB available space Additional Notes: Contains customizable keyboard shortcuts, but can also be played with just a mouse or touch-screen.
